participant_2.background:
I lost my childhood dog when I was 10.
I relax and spend time with my friends and family when I am not working.
i moved far from home.
I live in a house with my bass guitar named Big Bertha.
I like to read the news and write my own stories.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
Hi, I'm doing well, thanks. Just finished working and now getting ready to relax.
Relaxing sounds nice. What do you like to do to relax?
I like to spend time with my friends and family. I also like to read and play music.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun things to do. What do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of things, but I mostly read fiction and nonfiction. I also like to read the news and write my own stories.
That's awesome. I love to read too. I mostly read fiction, but I also like to read nonfiction and the news.
What's your favorite book?
It's hard to say, but I really like "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
That's a great book! I love the way Fitzgerald writes.
Me too. He's one of my favorite authors.
I've heard good things about "The Catcher in the Rye" by J.D. Salinger. Have you read it?
Yes, I have. It's a great book. I love the way Salinger writes about adolescence.
I'll have to check it out. I'm always looking for new books to read.
Me too. I love finding new books to read.
It's a great way to escape from reality for a while.
Exactly. It's nice to be able to lose yourself in a good book.
I agree. It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
Yes, it is. I'm glad we're both book lovers.
Me too. It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
